<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fortifiedlibcallsimplifier">FortifiedLibCallSimplifier</a></>}>
This class implements simplifications for calls to fortified library functions (&#95;&#95;st&#42;cpy&#95;chk, &#95;&#95;memcpy&#95;chk, &#95;&#95;memmove&#95;chk, &#95;&#95;memset&#95;chk), to, when possible, replace them with their non-checking counterparts. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fortifiedlibcallsimplifier/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/libcallsimplifier">LibCallSimplifier</a></>}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/libcallsimplifier">LibCallSimplifier</a> - This class implements a collection of optimizations that replace well formed calls to library functions with a more optimal form. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/libcallsimplifier/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="comment">/// LibCallSimplifier - This class implements a collection of optimizations</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="comment">/// that replace well formed calls to library functions with a more optimal</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="comment">/// form.  For example, replacing &#39;printf(&quot;Hello!&quot;)&#39; with &#39;puts(&quot;Hello!&quot;)&#39;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// optimizeCall - Take the given call instruction and return a more</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// optimal value to replace the instruction with or 0 if a more</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// optimal form can&#39;t be found.  Note that the returned value may</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// be equal to the instruction being optimized.  In this case all</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// other instructions that use the given instruction were modified</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// and the given instruction is dead.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The call must not be an indirect call.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/libcallsimplifier/#a73c4a774eb638f963533b77f7124293b">optimizeCall</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callinst">CallInst</a> &#42;CI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase">IRBuilderBase</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
